text: Akave avar tam cakotara(n punyami)nin poti(yaic coti)kku munne, avarkalutaiya kotikalai (cotikka) arampittar; pinpu atanai tam(conta) cakotaranin potiyiliruntu velippatuttinar; ivvaraka yusuhpukkaka nam or upayam ceytu kotuttom; allah natinalanri, avar tam cakotaranai etuttuk kolla aracarin cattappati iyalatiruntar - nam natiyavarkalin patavikalai nam uyarttukinrom; kalvi arivutaiya ovvoruvarukkum melana arinta oruvan irukkave ceykiran
